attributes.additional_details: FRONT LINE WORKERS / KEY WORKER'S WHO GET PAID WHO ARE PUTTING THERE LIVES AND FAMILY BUBBLE AT RISK TO SAVE OTHERS SHOULD GET A TAX FREE / BONUS SCHEME WHILST LOCKDOWN IS ON    THIS IS ONLY RIGHT
attributes.background: Stop taking tax front line workers or key workers whilst lockdown is on and there working to save lives

rejection.details:
We understand that you'd like key workers to not be taxed, however it's not clear which form or forms of tax you wish such workers to be exempted from, nor for how long.

You might however like to sign these petitions which call for related actions:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320647
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556818

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/
